info.title: My Pets API
info.description: Awesome, Mega Cool API to manage Ariel's Pet Leopards!

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Category and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Category with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Category with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Category with the requested ID.

204.description: Category with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Category and persists changes to storage.

post.summary: Create a new Pet and attach it to the Category
post.description: Creates a new Pet and attaches it to the Category

200.description: Pet created and attached to the Category

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Pet and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Pet with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Pet with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Pet with the requested ID.

204.description: Pet with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Pet and persists changes to storage.

post.summary: Create a new Category and attach it to the Pet
post.description: Creates a new Category and attaches it to the Pet

200.description: Category created and attached to the Pet

post.summary: Create a new Pet and attach it to the Pet
post.description: Creates a new Pet and attaches it to the Pet

200.description: Pet created and attached to the Pet

get.description: Find the attached User of the Pet with the given ID

200.description: User attached to Pet with requested ID was found

post.summary: Create a new User and attach it to the Pet
post.description: Creates a new User and attaches it to the Pet

200.description: User created and attached to the Pet

delete.description: Delete the attached Owner of the Pet with the given ID

204.description: Owner with requested ID was deleted

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new User and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the User with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: User with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the User with the requested ID.

204.description: User with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a User and persists changes to storage.

post.summary: Create a new Pet and attach it to the User
post.description: Creates a new Pet and attaches it to the User

200.description: Pet created and attached to the User
